title: error: save checkpoint state, could not process slots up to 1096
body:
Saw this in run time

```
[2019-08-28 11:32:07]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying fork choice for block headRoot=a0c36b77adfb00cef3419d87f1009ad4ac84f0afd5fd87612e875e35d86cfeb8 headSlot=1095
[2019-08-28 11:32:17]  INFO forkchoice: Executing state transition on block slot=1097
[2019-08-28 11:32:18]  INFO blockchain: Finished state transition and updated fork choice store for block attestations=1 deposits=0 root=5e2e61a3124951ec5379beabae9ecc640e40996a6a76e24fd147b9d5fc7b1c97 slot=1097
[2019-08-28 11:32:19]  INFO blockchain: Finished applying fork choice for block headRoot=5e2e61a3124951ec5379beabae9ecc640e40996a6a76e24fd147b9d5fc7b1c97 headSlot=1097
[2019-08-28 11:32:20] ERROR rpc: could not receive attestation in chain service error=context canceled
could not process slots up to 1096
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain/forkchoice.(*Store).saveCheckpointState
	beacon-chain/blockchain/forkchoice/process_attestation.go:133
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain/forkchoice.(*Store).OnAttestation
	beacon-chain/blockchain/forkchoice/process_attestation.go:80
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*ChainService).ReceiveAttestationNoPubsub
	beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_attestation.go:66
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/blockchain.(*ChainService).ReceiveAttestation
	beacon-chain/blockchain/receive_attestation.go:48
github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/rpc.(*AttesterServer).SubmitAttestation.func1
	beacon-chain/rpc/attester_server.go:51
runtime.goexit
```
